Articles.Content:
I was de-orbiting my tug over the north pole of Kerbin, when I got a great shot of the Mun.

Except when I took the screen shot It has all this other dumb stuff in it.

So I did some fancy photoshoping and ending up with this prestigious picture (oh its so punny).

I know its not much, but I think its perdy, and I thought I would share it with y'all.

And its also about the right size for a flag...

Hint, hint.

Edited July 11, 2013 by Spaceisbeautifulul
Can't see it, Pics are so small and I do not own a Microscope =P but does look good.

Oh, sorry, I don't know how to enlarge it.

I guess my young eyes can see it better, sorry!

Here's another fun photo:

I can't stop making puns. Help me please.

I don't know how to enlarge it

-----

I can't stop making puns. Help me please.

Puns? I dont see any.. And for the enlarging you can use photoshop to scale it up, or other programs. In photoshop goto the EDIT tab, then to image size, when scaleing it you may have to change the scale settings at the bottom of the poped up window to make sure it still looks good and not blurry.

The image itself looks good with the small thumbnail size, however it looks rather bare, but the second image has more to it, perhaps the first is too small and so cuts part of it out?

And off topic it took me at least 5 times of reading through your sig before seeing the second "the", however your name i saw the extra ending section first time

Edited July 29, 2013 by IWantSumCrusha

Puns? I dont see any..

Correct! 'Tis alliteration you are using, Space!

Anyway, good pictures!
